item.title: Wifi-Bridge
item.description: Description The device(Mac mini) has a wired(eth0) interface and a wifi(wlan0) interface; eth0 connected to lan with a static ip address, whilewlan0 is used as an access point(ap); Wireless device, such as iphone will connected to lan through wlan0 by access the ap Package prepare Notice: Be sure to set use=‘ap …’ emerge -avq net-wireless/wpa_supplicant emerge -avq net-misc/bridge-utils Configuration /etc/conf.d/net # The bridge will take the ip address, so the individual interfaces don't need any config_eth0="null" config_wlan0="null" modules_wlan0="wpa_supplicant" wpa_supplicant_wlan0="-b br0 -Dnl80211 -d -f /var/log/wpa_supplicant.
